title: Geraint Thomas' TV presenter wife Sara Elen Thomas gives birth to their first child
text:

Tour de France winner Geraint Thomas is celebrating after his wife gave birth to their first child.

The British cycling champ, 33, and his TV presenter wife Sara, 27, announced the arrival of their boy on social media.

Thomas, who also won BBC Sports Personality of The Year in 2018, posted a picture of his son’s feet.

And the Welsh star wrote: “Yesterday was our 4 year wedding anniversary and earlier this week we welcomed another Thomas into the family.”

He added: “Sa and our little boy doing great. #ifcarlsbergdidweeks.”

Thomas was part of the GB team competing in the World Championships in Yorkshire last weekend.

He then raced back to Wales to be present for the birth at a Cardiff hospital.

They have not yet revealed the name of the baby boy but are expected to go for a traditional Welsh name.

Sara previously worked as an anchor on TV covering the Tour de France.
